thread.title: Lib Dem peer insists PM could change her mind on Brexit at ANY TIME over next two years
thread.title_full: Lib Dem peer insists PM could change her mind on Brexit at ANY TIME over next two years

title: Lib Dem peer insists PM could change her mind on Brexit at ANY TIME over next two years
text: UK Lib Dem peer insists PM could change her mind on Brexit at ANY TIME over next two years Lib Dem peer insists PM could change her mind on Brexit at ANY TIME over next two years LORD NEWBY has claimed Theresa May could alter her decision at any point during Brexit negotiations and keep the UK inside the EU. PUBLISHED: 22:01, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 | UPDATED: 22:33, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 Speaking on LBC , Lord Newby backed Article 50 author Lord Kerr’s comments in the House of Lords that Britain could pull out of Brexit at any stage during the next two years, or longer if there’s an extension to the negotiations. Responding to host Iain Dale’s question as to whether Article 50 could be reversible, Lord Newby, Leader of the Liberal Democrats in the Lords, replied “yes”. “The consensus is that it is reversible amongst senior lawyers,” he said. GETTY Lord Newby said the Prime Minister could change her mind on Brexit Related articles
